creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
inscription:
Signature, Inscription and Label

on back, URC, in blue and black ink: [(partially cut off) March 7th 1964 / 3-7-64 / To Tommy / From Grandpa / Richard Holzschuh]
markings: on back, taped to board: [From the desk of / Jim Hogan (printed on paper) / 3-7-64 / DON / THIS WAS / DICKS LAST / DRAWING WHICH HE / MADE FOR OUR SON / TOM BORN 11-16-63]
provenance: The artist; his stepson, Jim Hogan, Hudson, WI.
signed: LLC, in black ink: [R / H]; see Inscription
title: Untitled [three figures with a personified tree]
